Description: Body sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black; trace of rosette in faded added white outline with added red centre above two faded white bands; exterior: painted decoration consisting of shoulder with red patch and mane of lion to right.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 284, no. 854)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1037) (phase 2)
